[Core]

Filter="%Severity% >= 2"


[Sinks.1]

Destination=Console
Format="%TimeStamp% *** %Message%"
Filter="%Tag% | %Severity% > 3"


[Sinks.2]

Destination=TextFile
FileName=test.log
AutoFlush=true
Format="[%TimeStamp%] %Tag% %Message%"
